snippet: Rikki Samuels, who teaches amateurs and a Rockette or two the moves to master Rockefeller Center’s ice-skating rink, loves the ice so much she even got married there.
abstract: Character Study column on Rikki Samuels, former competitive skater who began ice skating at Rockefeller Center as a child in the 1950s and teaches lessons there today.
lead_paragraph: Rikki Samuels, who teaches amateurs and a Rockette or two the moves to master Rockefeller Center’s ice-skating rink, loves the ice so much she even got married there.

headline.print_headline: The Ice Queen of Rock Center
headline.seo: Rikki Samuels, 74, the Ice Queen of Rockefeller Center
headline.main: The Ice Queen of Rock Center
